#summary Upper Dorsal Root Ganglion

This page covers biological details of component Upper Dorsal Root Ganglion.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Peripheral Nervous System -> Sensory Ganglia (PN.SG) -> Dorsal Root Ganglion (AVA.PN.SG.DRG) -> Upper Dorsal Root Ganglion (LPC.PN.SG.UDRG) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: sensory ganglion
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaLPC Lower Brain - Peripheral Control Area]
  * *Role*: sensory
  * *Function*: Integration of afferent signaling from cervical and upper thoracic somatic and viscera
  * *Notes to function*: C1-C8, T1-T6
